channel.title: XP run
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "XP run" - need a bit of help

item.title: Re: XP run-Sparring
item.content:encoded:
Since u need a sparring bonus to get more stamina for this then it would be useful if i could get some more sparring buddies,
Add the name "Theseus" so we can spar together, and let me know your name as well.

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded:
The bonuses a village can give are, for the most part, easily replaced. The only thing that could really set you behind would be not having a Potion Palace, and then you could just get Wasteland Disease to unlock the item mixing page anyways.

Hollow Leg just requires that you have Bankai, Lil' Bo lvl 2, and a lot of Tasty Burgers, if I remember correctly. Timmy lvl 2 is leveled up on a B-rank reaper mission…Tai spammable I think? Annie is available on a Gen-spammable B-rank and levels on a Nin-spammable B-rank. It shouldn't take too long to get those two allies leveled ( especially compared to the Crazy Love Triangle team ), though the Hollow Leg can take a while to get.

Getting the Trade and Anon just requires that you be able to bingo some people, and then after you have the Trade, get Note Page'd for Anon. He can then teach you a "+50% AP/XP, -50% ryo" jutsu called Obsessive Insight, increasing your XP gain even farther.

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded: i guess you all have a pretty powerful village and lots of allies already. i am not even close to start some of the missions that i need to get these items. haha

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded:
Base Appetite: 140
Hollow Leg: +50
Diet Ramen: +40

Hollow Leg is very useful, and you should definitely should look into getting one this season if you haven't already. 2 drinks of the +5 appetite drink at the Juice Bar would give enough for a fourth Silver Elixir as well, though Diet Ramen could be used as a substitute.

It shouldn't be too hard, really, especially if you stack the XP bonuses better than I did the other day. The only bonuses I had going for me were the village's Ancient Teachings ( +10% ), Timmy lvl 2 ( +20% ), my RedEye bloodline bonus ( +21% ), and Annie lvl 2 ( +30% ), used 3 Silver Elixirs and the Teriyaki Ramen, and got my 500k with some 60 or 70 stamina left over.

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded: You should also get the item Hollow Leg

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded: i only have 140% per day and each silver elixer is 50%, how do you use 3-4?

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded: whoa, 250 stamina potion is a serious waste for jonin run, you should have saved it for sannin run. and for jonin run, only drink silver elixirs (3-4 if you use hollow leg/ appetie potion)

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded:
Were you running missions with the Obsessive Insight jutsu taught by Anonymous? It gives +50% AP/XP ( which boosts Ranking XP too ), and is really helpful for gaining XP. Timmy lvl 2 ( +20% AP/XP ) and Annie lvl 2 ( +30% Ranking XP ) are helpful allies as well. Try looking into getting a Hollow Leg when you get the chance too, as it's a quite helpful appetite bonus.

Seriously…you should be able to down 2-4 silver elixirs and get the rest of the ranking XP you need for Jonin just through B-rank missions, with a good XP set up.

item.title: Re: XP run
item.content:encoded: Did you try taking a few Silver Elixirs?
